sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './style.css'; import {Friends, Gaming, HomeActive, Logo, Market, Menu, Search, Watch, Messenger, Notifications, ArrowDown} from "../../svg"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import SearchMenu from './SearchMenu'; export default function Header() { const {user}=useSelector((user)=>({...user})); const color = '#EBF7FF'; return (
{user.first_name}
) }
